https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lVdPQd4xZbjc9GqWhLSTiGUEGz0.jpg Chasing Asylum tells the story of Australia's cruel, inhumane treatment of asylum seekers and refugees, examining the human, political, financial and moral impact of current and previous policy. Chasing Asylum
